This incident took place on highway 231 in Lebanon, TN, where for several hours section of the highway was closed down and nearby residents were evacuated.
After the bomb squad from the Tennessee Highway Patrol Special Investigations department cleared the vehicle, it was towed off, presumably to police impound.
